ST18-001.name: Uso-Hachi ST18-001
ST18-001.effect: [On Play] If you have 8 or more DON!! cards on your field, rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less.

ST18-002.name: O-Nami ST18-002
ST18-002.effect: [Blocker] [On Play] If you have 8 or more DON!! cards on your field, trash 1 card from your hand and draw 2 cards.

ST18-003.name: San-Gorou ST18-003
ST18-003.effect: [When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] If you have 8 or more DON!! cards on your field, draw 1 card.

ST18-004.name: Zoro-Juurou ST18-004
ST18-004.effect: [On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 purple {Straw Hat Crew} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

ST18-005.name: Luffy-Tarou ST18-005
ST18-005.effect: [On Play] DON!! âˆ’1 Play up to 1 purple {Straw Hat Crew} type Character card with a cost of 5 or less from your hand.
